about.title: About Me
about.description: I am a passionate web developer with a strong interest in building responsive, user-friendly websites.
about.experience: My focus is on building high-performance websites that solve real-world problems and provide exceptional user experiences. I'm always eager to explore new technologies and continuously improve my skills.

project.name: Blossom & Bliss
project.description: Blossom & Bliss is a web application designed for a beauty and wellness parlour. It allows customers to browse services, book appointments, and make online payments.

project.name: Street-11
project.description: Street11 is a modern web application designed for seamless online ordering and menu browsing.Users can explore various food categories, customize their orders, and place them online

project.name: Dear Watch
project.description: Dear Watch is a watch selling website where users can browse different watch collections, view details, and make purchases.
